alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prairie, northern Lonoke and southwestern White Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McRae, or 11 miles south of Searcy, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Beebe... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... West Point... Thurman... Crosby... McRae... Garner... Griffithville... Antioch in White County... Vinity Corner... Walker... Center Hill... Butlerville... Hickory Plains... Armstrong Springs... Plainview in White County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
